Name: Camera Name 1
Camera_Description: Velodyne’s Puck lidar sensor (previously VLP-16) is the highest-value sensor on the market. The Puck™’s reliability, power efficiency, and surround view make it the ideal solution for affordable low-speed autonomy and driver assistance applications.

Name: Camera Name 2
Camera_Description: The Hokuyo UST-10LX LIDAR sensor is the optimal laser scanning solution for obstacle detection and localization. It's an advanced tool that detects and locates objects along the path of several types of automated machines and vehicles.
